article: A generation gap has become a serious problem.! read a report about it in the newspaper. Some children have killed  _  after quarrelling with  _  .I think this is because they don't often have a talk with each other. Parents now  _  more time in the office,  _  they don't have much time to stay with their children. As time passes, they both feel that they don't have the  _  topic to talk about. I want to tell parents to be more patient with your  _  ,get to know them and  look after  them. And for children, show your  _  to your parents. They are the people who love you. So  _  them your thoughts. In this way, you  _  have a better understanding of each other.
